comment: Dr. Robin Johnson of El Paso County Public Health Medical Director: -practice good hygiene, cough into your elbow, try not to touch face -#coronavirus is spread through droplets, a sneeze or cough can have droplets that travel about 6ft-stay home if you have symptoms
A sign health officials gave me on how to wash your hands correctly! #coronavirusprevention https://t.co/CTnewXj170
.@MayorofCOS Suthers speaking now. Says its important to look at credible information, and says we have been preparing for something like this for a long time.
Dr. Johnson: Promote facts, not fear.
Mayor Suthers: I have the upmost confidence in our public health systems.
City of #ColoradoSprings and El Paso County are taking collaborative approach when it comes to #Coronavirus.
Working to increase test capabilities in Colorado.Not speaking on how many/if any tests have been taken in El Paso County for #Coronavirus
HAPPENING NOW: I am at a press conference about #coronavirus held by local health officials to prevent the spread of coronavirus disease. More on @KKTV11News https://t.co/Q3wIbFZqRY

What else can people do? -wearing a face mask is NOT recommended someone who isnt sick (health care providers need them) -wash hands for at least 20 seconds with soap and water (sing ABCs twice)-use hand sanitizer
